channel.title: GPL on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in GPL on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Is Android Open Source Or Not?
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Is Android really open source or not? That is the question being asked by almost everyone. A lot of people, especially those influenced by RDF or those who are in the news industry with no idea about OS and open source but were asked by their boss to get a scoop on this pronto, tend to bring up a few keywords and then twist them around in the way they see fit to make sure it says Android isn't open.

item.title: Creative Open Sources X-Fi Sound Card Driverâ€¦Finally
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Creative has finally come to its senses and turned to the open source community to raise its X-Fi series of sound cards from the ashes on the linux platform, which got burnt mostly due to the poor quality of the drivers that Creative was giving out. The announcement for releasing the source code, licensed under GPL v2, was made on their forums. For the announcement and download details, click here.
